blogPost.excerpt: Without Community, There Is No Crypto. LunarCRUSH is a social listening platform for cryptocurrencies and helps investors make better decisions by tracking the community each cryptocurrency is building through beautiful dashboards and real-time data analysis.
blogPost.body: Without Community, There Is No Crypto. LunarCRUSH is a social listening platform for cryptocurrencies and helps investors make better decisions by tracking the community each cryptocurrency is building through beautiful dashboards and real-time data analysis.
blogPost.title: LunarCRUSH - Social Listening for Cryptocurrencies
blogPost.author: Mahesh Shrestha

localize.description: 没有社区，就没有加密。LunarCRUSH是一个加密货币的社交聆听平台，通过精美的仪表盘和实时数据分析，跟踪每个加密货币正在建立的社区，帮助投资者做出更好的决策。
沒有社區，就沒有加密。LunarCRUSH是一個加密貨幣的社交聆聽平臺，通過精美的儀表盤和實時數據分析，跟蹤每個加密貨幣正在建立的社區，幫助投資者做出更好的決策。

previous.excerpt: With Crove app you can create your repetitive business documents as intelligent templates that use variables and logical conditions.
previous.title: Crove - Automate your repetitive business documents

localize.description: 通过Crove应用，您可以将重复性的业务文档创建为使用变量和逻辑条件的智能模板。
localize.tagline: 自动化您的重复性业务文件

localize.description: 通過Crove應用，您可以將重複性的業務文檔創建爲使用變量和邏輯條件的智能模板。
localize.tagline: 自動化您的重複性業務文件

next.excerpt: Your same bank account, but without the annoying fees. Enjoy fee-free banking with your current account, no need to switch banks or open new accounts. Waiver blocks overdraft, maintenance and late credit card fees.
next.title: Waiver - Block overdraft, maintenance and credit card late fees

localize.description: 您同样的银行账户，但没有恼人的费用。使用您的现有账户享受免手续费的银行服务，无需转换银行或开立新账户。豁免透支费、维持费和信用卡逾期费。
localize.tagline: 阻止透支、维护费和信用卡滞纳金。

localize.description: 您同樣的銀行賬戶，但沒有惱人的費用。使用您的現有賬戶享受免手續費的銀行服務，無需轉換銀行或開立新賬戶。豁免透支費、維持費和信用卡逾期費。
localize.tagline: 阻止透支、維護費和信用卡滯納金。
